description:
In this whimsical narrative adventure, you’ll play as Joojee, a lovable bunny who suddenly wakes up without her memory. Armed with nothing but her charm and a mysterious magic brush that allows her to enter anyone’s mind, Joojee goes on a journey to recover her lost memories while helping others overcome their own troubles.
Game features:
•	Touching and funny character backstories and memories.
•	Challenging platformer sequences.
•	Mind-bending riddles and puzzles.
•	Assist mode that lets players skip challenging obstacles if they wish.
Prepare to smile, laugh, and cry in Joojee’s journey! Available in Thai, English, Japanese, and French. More languages will be released in the future.
name: Joojee's Journey
